Declare Sensors
func:
msg.payload = {
    "sensors": [
        {
            "device_name": "SmartThermostat",
            "device_type": "ModernDevice",
            "sensor_name": "tempSensor01",
            "measure": "temperature",
            "data_format": "JSON",
            "room": "exhibition1",
            "protocol": "CoAP",
            "iot_standard": "OneM2M",
            "threshold": "20.00"
        },
        {
            "device_name": "SmartAirQuality",
            "device_type": "ModernDevice",
            "sensor_name": "airQualitySensor01",
            "measure": "air_quality",
            "data_format": "JSON",
            "room": "exhibition1",
            "protocol": "CoAP",
            "iot_standard": "OneM2M",
            "threshold": "100.00"
        },
        {
            "device_name": "LightSensor",
            "device_type": "ModernDevice",
            "sensor_name": "illuminationSensor01",
            "measure": "illumination",
            "data_format": "JSON",
            "room": "exhibition1",
            "protocol": "Zigbee",
            "iot_standard": "LwM2M",
            "threshold": "300.00"
        },
        {
            "device_name": "NoiseDetector",
            "device_type": "ModernDevice",
            "sensor_name": "noiseSensor01",
            "measure": "noise",
            "data_format": "JSON",
            "room": "exhibition1",
            "protocol": "LoRaWAN",
            "iot_standard": "FIWARE",
            "threshold": "70.00"
        },
        {
            "device_name": "SmokeDetector",
            "device_type": "LegacyDevice",
            "sensor_name": "smokeSensor01",
            "measure": "smoke",
            "data_format": "XML",
            "room": "exhibition1",
            "protocol": "Bluetooth",
            "iot_standard": "EclipseDitto",
            "threshold": "1.00"
        }
    ]
};

return msg
